description:
At Duffy & Young, LLC, our intelligent attorneys represent Charleston corporations in a wide range of cases. When companies choose our South Carolina law office, they can count on 150 years of experience developed during almost 300 trials and more than 150 appeals.

The civil cases in which we represent our commercial clients span a wide area. These are some of the most important cases handled by our law office:

• Business disputes: When two commercial entities have a disagreement, we represent our clients to increase their chances of securing the outcome they seek.
• Defamation: We help protect our clients' reputations from the handiwork of people who wield defamation as a weapon.
• Medical malpractice: We represent both plaintiffs and defendants in medical malpractice cases and other personal injury cases.
• Real estate and property: From construction law to condemnation claims to real property disputes, our attorneys are ready to tackle the case.
• Financial and securities: We handle civil cases related to securities fraud, shareholder derivative actions, and banking and lender liability claims.

Since we established Duffy & Young, LLC in 2007, our law office has experienced serious growth. We currently have nine attorneys on staff who come from diverse professional backgrounds and bring unique perspectives to each case we handle. We look forward to serving you.
